text: Sakala manusa eka'i jati sattara antarbhukta chila. Atahpara allaha taâ€™ala payagambara pathalena susambadadata o bhiti pradarsanakari hisabe. Ara tamdera sathe abartina karalena satya kitaba, yate manusera majhe bitarkamulaka bisaye mimansa karate parena. Bastutah kitabera byapare an'ya ke'u matabheda kareni; kintu pariskara nirdesa ese yabara para nijedera parasparika jedabasatah tara'i kareche, yara kitaba prapta hayechila. Atahpara allaha imanadaraderake hedayeta karechena se'i satya bisaye, ye byapare tara matabheda lipta hayechila. Allaha yake iccha, sarala patha batale dena.
